Description: Stores information about the policies including id, agency_mailbox_id, carrier_id, insured_id, parent_id, policy_number, billing_account_number, deleted_billing_account_number, company_code, line_of_business_code, line_of_business_subcode, producer_subcode, original_policy_inception_date, renewal_term, current_term_amount, net_change_amount, billing_method_code, payor_code, company_product_code, policy_effective_date, policy_expiration_date, deleted_policy_effective_date, deleted_policy_expiration_date, latest_transaction, cancellation_date, reason_code, status, to_be_reviewed, written_amount, pma_code, rate_date, created_at, updated_at
"Stores information about the insureds covered in policies including id
"Stores information about the insurance carriers including id
"Stores information about the froms attached in the policy including id
"Stores information about any remarks in policy including id
"Stores data about the file download history from ivans including id
